import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import { Form, Button, Row, Col, Container } from 'react-bootstrap' import { useDispatch, useSelector } from 'react-redux' import Message from '../components/Message' import Loader from '../components/Loader' import { login } from '../actions/userActions' import FormContainer from '../components/FormContainer' import './RegisterScreen.css' const LoginScreen = ({ location, history }) => { //component level state const [email, setEmail] = useState('') const [password, setPassword] = useState('') const dispatch = useDispatch() const userLogin = useSelector((state) => state.userLogin) const { loading, error, userInfo } = userLogin const redirect = location.search ? location.search.split('=')[1] : '/' useEffect(() => { if (userInfo) { history.push(redirect) } }, [history, userInfo, redirect]) const submitHandler = (e) => { e.preventDefault() dispatch(login(email, password)) } return (//TODO: chagen design

Welcome to Carento Family

{error && {error}} {loading && }
setEmail(e.target.value)}>
setPassword(e.target.value)} >
Dont Have an Account?{' '} Register
) } export default LoginScreen
